description:
Join the 400+ students and learn how to improve your relationships TODAY!

Course Updated May 2016.

Have you ever needed to have a difficult conversation, but didn't know where to start?

  1. Learn practical ways to have less stress and more satisfying relationships.
  2. Learn how to understand others better.
  3. Learn how to prevent arguments without sacrificing your soul.

Who Will Benefit form this Course?

Anyone who wants to improve the quality of their relationships.

  • Spouse
  • Parent
  • Sibling
  • Friend
  • Employee
  • Employer

Who Should NOT Enroll in this Course?

Anyone who wants to force or manipulate others.

Lectures and conversational guides to be added soon!

  1. How to deal with a manipulative family member.
  2. How to successfully resolve relationship and family arguments.
  3. How to end a relationship.

Bonus Material

This course includes a downloadable Conversation Worksheet, to help you prepare for a difficult conversation.

Course Format

90 minute lecture presentation

Test your knowledge by completing the course quiz

No Risk 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
title: How to Have a Difficult Conversation
